You've found a rope..correct: This rope can be dangerous if an animal gets tangled in it. It can make it hard to walk, fly or swim.
You've found a rope..incorrect: This rope should be removed because it can be dangerous if an animal gets tangled in it. It can make it hard to walk, fly or swim.
